messages.ADD_TRIGGER_SUCCESS: I will now send a `%WC%` response when I hear `%WC%`!
messages.FAMILY_CREATED: The Family was created! Now let's go add other servers!
messages.FAMILY_JOIN_CODE: **Join Code for %WC%**%BR%`%WC%`%BR%_Use this one-time code to join a server to the Family._
messages.FAMILY_JOIN_CODE_INVALIDATED: [The Join Code has been invalidated for security purposes]
messages.FAMILY_SERVER_LIST: The "%WC%" Family contains the following servers:
messages.FEEDBACK_COOLDOWN: Please wait a bit before submitting more feedback.
messages.FEEDBACK_SENT: :notepad_spiral: Your feedback has been noted. Thanks!%BR%You can report again in **5 minutes**.
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_DUPLICATE: :warning: Found an existing Forum Weapon with that link: **%WC%**
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_UPDATED: The weapon was updated with a new link!
messages.INVALID_TRIGGER_TYPE: :scream: Invalid trigger type! Your options are: %WC%
messages.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_CONVERTED: Converted the queue into a new Playlist `%WC%` with `%WC%` tracks!
messages.SERVER_FAMILY_LIST: This server has joined the following Families:
messages.TALLY_LIST: Here's what I have written down:

errors.ALREADY_EXISTS: I think you've already done that!
errors.BOT_ERROR: I sense a plot to destroy me.
errors.CANNOT_DELETE: Sorry, I can't let you delete that. It's very precious to me.
errors.CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: I can't find the correct channel for that.
errors.COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: That command hasn't been invented yet!
errors.FAMILY_ALREADY_EXISTS: You already own a family with that name! Please choose a different name.
errors.FAMILY_ALREADY_JOINED: This server already belongs to that family!
errors.FAMILY_INVALID_DETAIL: Invalid Family name or Join Code!
errors.FAMILY_NOT_JOINED: That server has not joined that Family!
errors.FAMILY_MEMBER_MAXIMUM_REACHED: That family has reached the maximum number of servers!
errors.FAMILY_MAXIMUM_REACHED: You can only join up to 3 families!
errors.FAMILY_SERVER_LIST_EMPTY: This Family does not contain any servers.
errors.FORUM_WEAPON_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Sorry! I can only keep up to 100 weapons. Please remove some existing weapons before creating more.
errors.FORUM_WEAPON_OWNED_OTHER: That weapon is owned by a different server!
errors.GUILD_REQUIRED: That command must be run on a server.
errors.HANGMAN_NOT_STARTED: There isn't a Hangman game running! Try starting one.
errors.INCOMPLETE: I'm gonna need a few more details.
errors.INCORRECT_ITEM_COUNT: You've supplied an incorrect number of thingz!
errors.MUSIC_NOT_IN_CHANNEL: Please join a voice channel and run this command again.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_ALREADY_EXISTS: A Playlist with that name already exists on this server!
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_EMPTY: There are no tracks in that Playlist.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_NAME_MISSING: Please enter a name for the new Playlist.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in that Playlist on this page.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_TRACK_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Playlists currently support a max of 50 tracks.
errors.MUSIC_QUEUE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue.
errors.MUSIC_QUEUE_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue on this page.
errors.MUSIC_WRONG_INPUT: Please enter a media URL or playlist name!
errors.NO_PERMISSION_BOT: I ran into some trouble with the law...
errors.NO_PERMISSION_USER: I'm afraid I can't let you do that.
errors.NOT_FOUND: That thing you said... I'm not sure what it is.
errors.RESERVED_WORD: Sorry, you can't use that totally awesome name!
errors.SERVER_FAMILY_LIST_EMPTY: This server does not belong to a Family.
errors.TIME_VALUE_INCORRECT: The amount of time provided is invalid!
errors.TRACK_NOT_PLAYING: There isn't a track playing right now.
errors.WRONG_USAGE: I don't think that's how you do it.
